The namespace prefix http://cisco.com/jnap/ has been deprecated but is still supported. All JNAP clients should switch to the new namespace prefix http://linksys.com/jnap/.

Change History

Revision Date Notes
8.0.0 2019-07-17 Added Reliability service to indicate the following action now requires authentication:
  • GetDiagnosticsSettings
6.0.0 2018-08-02 Moved Reliability Phase II services (Diagnostics6) from diagnostics.hsl to to this module.

Services

Diagnostics6

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/Diagnostics6
This service provides access to diagnostic utilities.

Service Actions

  • GetDiagnosticsSettings
  • GetSupportedSysinfoSections
  • GetSysinfoData4
  • GetSysinfoRequestStatus2
  • RequestSysinfoData2
  • SetDiagnosticsSettings

Reliability

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/Reliability
This service provides access to diagnostic utilities.

Service Actions

  • GetDiagnosticsSettings
  • GetSupportedSysinfoSections
  • GetSysinfoData4
  • GetSysinfoRequestStatus2
  • RequestSysinfoData2
  • SetDiagnosticsSettings

Actions

GetDiagnosticsSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/GetDiagnosticsSettings
This action gets the configuration settings for collecting and uploading diagnostics data.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
autoUploadEnabled bool no Whether automatic data uploading is enabled. This feature will only be enabled if the user has consented to allow the automatic uploads. When enabled, diagnostics data is automatically collected and uploaded to the Linksys cloud when certain system events occur.
dataTypes DataType[] no A list of the types of data that are currently collected and uploaded when certain system events occur.
sysinfoSettings SysinfoSettings yes Configuration settings for periodic Sysinfo data uploads.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/GetDiagnosticsSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/GetDiagnosticsSettings"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "autoUploadEnabled": true,
    "dataTypes": [
      "SysInfo"
    ],
    "sysinfoSettings": {
      "periodicUploadEnabled": true,
      "sections": [
        "example string"
      ],
      "uploadInterval": "Hourly"
    }
  }
}

GetSupportedSysinfoSections

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/GetSupportedSysinfoSections
This action gets the sysinfo sections that are supported on this platform.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
supportedSysinfoSections string[] no The sysinfo sections data that can be requested.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/GetSupportedSysinfoSectionsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/GetSupportedSysinfoSections"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "supportedSysinfoSections": [
      "example string"
    ]
  }
}

GetSysinfoData4

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/GetSysinfoData4
This action gets the Syinfo diagnostics data that was generated by a call to RequestSysinfoData2. Use action GetSysinfoRequestStatus2 to determine when a request has completed. If GetSysinfoRequestStatus2's isRunning is true, then an empty array will be returned.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
sysinfoData blob no The base64 encoded string that represents the sysinfo data.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/GetSysinfoData4Result
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorSysinfoFailed The sysinfo process failed.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/GetSysinfoData4"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "sysinfoData": "aGVsbG8sIHdvcmxkIQ=="
  }
}

GetSysinfoRequestStatus2

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/GetSysinfoRequestStatus2
This action gets the status of a request for Sysinfo data, which can be initiated by calling RequestSysinfoData2.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
lastTriggered DateTime yes The time when the request sysinfo was last triggered. This value will not be returned if a refresh has not been triggered.
isRunning bool no Whether the sysinfo collector process is running.
uploadId string yes This value will be returned if and only if uploadWhenFinished was set to true and the upload was successful.
uploadErrorCode string yes This value will be returned if and only if uploadWhenFinished was set to true and the upload was unsuccessful.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/GetSysinfoRequestStatus2Result
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/GetSysinfoRequestStatus2"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "lastTriggered": "2017-03-15T00:00:00Z",
    "isRunning": true,
    "uploadId": "example string",
    "uploadErrorCode": "example string"
  }
}

RequestSysinfoData2

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/RequestSysinfoData2
This action initiates a request for Sysinfo diagnostics data. The data gathering takes a while, so to get the status please call GetSysinfoRequestStatus2. Once it is done you can call GetSysinfoData4 to retrieve the data.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
sections string[] yes A list of the Sysinfo data sections that will be requested. If this parameter omitted, all sections will be requested. If an empty array is passed, nothing will be requested.
uploadWhenFinished bool no Whether we should upload the sysinfo data when finished.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/RequestSysinfoData2Result
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorInvalidSection Invalid section has been requested. To get a list of supported sections, please call GetSupportedSysinfoSections.
ErrorRequestSysinfoAlreadyRunning Another instance of RequestSysinfoData2 is running.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/RequestSysinfoData2"

{
  "sections": [
    "example string"
  ],
  "uploadWhenFinished": true
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

SetDiagnosticsSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/SetDiagnosticsSettings
This action sets the configuration settings for collecting and uploading diagnostics data.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
autoUploadEnabled bool no Whether automatic data uploading should be enabled. This feature can only be enabled if the user has consented to allow the automatic uploads. When enabled, diagnostics data will be automatically collected and uploaded to the Linksys cloud when certain system events occur.
dataTypes DataType[] yes A list of the types of data that will be collected and uploaded when certain system events occur.
sysinfoSettings SysinfoSettings yes Configuration settings for periodic Sysinfo data uploads.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/SetDiagnosticsSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorEmptySectionsList The optional sysinfoSections array was input, but is empty.
ErrorNoUserConsent The autoUploadEnabled value is true, but the user has not consented to allow automatic data uploads.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/SetDiagnosticsSettings"

{
  "autoUploadEnabled": true,
  "dataTypes": [
    "SysInfo"
  ],
  "sysinfoSettings": {
    "periodicUploadEnabled": true,
    "sections": [
      "example string"
    ],
    "uploadInterval": "Hourly"
  }
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

Structures

SysinfoSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/SysinfoSettings
Data structure used to configure periodic Sysinfo data collection and uploads.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
periodicUploadEnabled bool no Whether the periodic uploading of Sysinfo data is enabled. When enabled, Sysinfo diagnostics data will automatically be uploaded to the Linksys cloud at the specified time interval.
sections string[] yes A list of Sysinfo data sections that should be included in the uploads. If this parameter is omitted, all sections will be uploaded.
uploadInterval UploadInterval no The interval at which the Sysinfo data will be uploaded to the Linksys cloud.

Enumerations

DataType

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/DataType
This service provides access to Reliability Phase2 diagnostic utilities. The diagnostics data types.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
SysInfo System diagnostics infomation by section.
CrashInfo Crash log and system data collected when a system crash occurs.

UploadInterval

http://linksys.com/jnap/diagnostics/UploadInterval
Time intervals for scheduling automatic Sysinfo data uploads.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
Hourly
Daily
Weekly
Monthly
